Installation

Step-by-Step Installation Guide

Follow these steps to install CIPT Chero Increment Profits Tracker on your Windows computer:

  1. Download the Installer:

    • Visit the CIPT Chero official website and download the CIPT_Installer.exe file.

  2. Run the Installer:

    • Locate the downloaded CIPT_Installer.exe file on your computer.
    • Double-click the file to run the installer.

  3. Follow the Installation Prompts:

    • You will see a welcome screen. Click "Next" to continue.
    • Choose the installation directory. By default, it is set to {userappdata}\CIPTFLDR.
    • Click "Next" and then "Install" to start the installation process.

  4. Complete the Installation:

    • Wait for the installer to copy all necessary files to your computer.
    • Once the installation is complete, click "Finish".

  5. Launch CIPT Chero:

    • A shortcut to CIPT Chero will be created on your desktop.
    • Double-click the shortcut to launch the application.

Enabling Macros

If CIPT Chero does not work correctly, you may need to enable macros in Microsoft Access. Follow these steps to enable macros:

  1. Open Microsoft Access:

    • Launch Microsoft Access from your Start menu or desktop shortcut.

  2. Access Options:

    • Click on the File tab in the top-left corner.
    • Select Options from the menu.

  3. Trust Center Settings:

    • In the Access Options window, select Trust Center from the left-hand menu.
    • Click on the Trust Center Settings button.

  4. Macro Settings:

    • In the Trust Center window, select || Macro Settings || from the left-hand menu.
    • Choose || Enable all macros || to allow all macros to run. (Note: This setting is less secure, as it allows all macros, including potentially harmful ones.)
    • Click OK to save the settings.

  5. Restart Microsoft Access:

    • Close and reopen Microsoft Access for the changes to take effect.

By following these steps, you should be able to enable macros and ensure CIPT Chero runs smoothly. If you encounter any issues, please refer to the Contact Me within the website.
